headline: Generac (GNRC) Is Down 7.6% After Cutting 2025 Sales Guidance Amid Competitive Pressure – What's Changed
summary: In the past week, Generac Holdings Inc. reported third quarter 2025 earnings with quarterly sales of US$1.11 billion and net income of US$66.16 million, both declining compared to the prior year, and also lowered its full-year 2025 net sales growth guidance to be flat versus the previous year, instead of the earlier projected 2% to 5% increase. This guidance cut highlights ongoing weakness in residential product demand and increased competition in the backup generator market, which have...
